entry.name: pdfcol
entry.caption: Defines macros fpr maintaining color stacks under pdfTeX.
entry.description:
Since version 1.40 pdfTeX supports color stacks. The driver file pdftex.def for package color defines and uses a main color stack since version v0.04b.
This package is intended for package writers. It defines macros for setting and maintaining new color stacks.
The package is part of the oberdiek bundle.
